description:
CHT (or CoinHe Token) is the ERC20-based token issued by CoinHe.io. CHT will not be sold by CoinHe but freely distributed to the community by airdrops and bounty campaigns. CoinHe will automatically distribute its revenue to CHT holders periodically. CHT holders will have certain rights towards any decision of the community.

name: CoinHe Token
